Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2008 02:48PM azjane wrote: LuAnn...I pm'd you a few days ago.....it was nice to "meet you".  I scraped up more to contribute and went ahead and sent to Angela via her PayPal email,  so don't look for my check in the mail!  Haven't heard back from Oprah or her people!  Will try Ellen.  LuAnn thanks so much for starting this and I hope your pain issues subside. Angela....it was such a joy to "converse" with you.  Looks like I'm out of the shadows now....just made my Avatar!  You women are so inspirational.
